guild: You cannot use this command outside a server.
idioma: The server language is English, to change it use
nsfw: This command is only for NSFW channels.
botPerms: I have not enough permissions to execute this command, I need the **{{perm}}** permission.
ownerOnly: This command can only be executed by the server owner.
comandoError:
An error occurred while executing the command.
Developers have been notified.
If you need help ask our support server, https://discordsafe.com/discord
permisos: You don't have enough permissions to use this command.
desactivado: This command is only available as a slash command, use `/{{commandName}}` to use it.
cooldown: You must wait {{segundos}} second/s to use this command again.

string.maxLength: You must enter a shorter text, less than {{max}} characters.
string.minLength: You must enter a longer text, longer than {{min}} characters.

user.acceptSelf: You cannot use yourself as a parameter.
user.acceptBot: Users are not accepted as parameters, only bots.
user.acceptUser: Bots are not accepted as a parameter, only users.
user.acceptDeveloper: Bot developers are not accepted as a parameter.

integer.min: The number must not be less than {{min}}.
integer.max: The number must not be greater than {{max}}.

role.highest: The role is upper your highest role, you can't use it.

color.invalidFormat:
Invalid color format, must be one of the following: {{validColors}}.
You can select a color at https://htmlcolorcodes.com/.

emoji.emojiNotFound: The emoji was not found in this server, try again sending an emoji from the server.

list.notMatch:
The parameters are wrongly separated, you must put it right.
Example: {{example}}.

dm: **Error, this command cannot be used in direct messages.
userPerms: You do not have enough permissions to use this command.
userPerms_detailed: You do not have enough permissions to use this command, you need the **{{perm}}** permission.
userPerms_detailed_plural: You do not have enough permissions to use this command, you need **{{perm}}** permissions.
botPerms_plural: I do not have enough permissions to execute this command, I need **{{perm}}** permissions.
